channel.title: CVE Feed for Thrive Themes -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Thrive Themes -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-47783|2024-06-19T10:36:02.808Z -- thrive%20themes -- thrive%20theme%20builder
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Thrive Themes Thrive Theme Builder.This issue affects Thrive Theme Builder: from n/a before 3.24.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-51531|2024-06-04T17:20:57.023Z -- thrive%20themes -- thrive%20automator
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Thrive Themes Thrive Automator.This issue affects Thrive Automator: from n/a through 1.17.

item.title: CVE-2023-47782|2024-05-17T08:37:20.996Z -- thrive%20themes -- thrive%20theme%20builder
item.description: Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in Thrive Themes Thrive Theme Builder allows Privilege Escalation.This issue affects Thrive Theme Builder: from n/a before 3.24.0.
